vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Zec.6.10; also called Helem at Zec.6.14;
Also named: che.lem (חֵ֫לֶם "Helem" H2494)
§ Heldai = "worldly"
1) one of David's mighty warriors and the 12th captain of the monthly courses for the temple service
2) a returning exile in the time of Zechariah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) חֵלֶד ,חֵלֶב   hijo de Baaná; de Netofá; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (b) חֵלֶם   sacerdote; en tiempos del profeta Zacarías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
黑玳 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "世間的"
1) 是大衛大有能力的戰士之一,也是每月例行在聖殿裡服侍的十二名首領之一 (代上27:15)
2) 與撒迦利亞同時間被擄歸回的人 (亞6:10)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
黑玳 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "世间的"
1) 是大卫大有能力的战士之一,也是每月例行在圣殿里服侍的十二名首领之一 (代上27:15)
2) 与撒迦利亚同时间被掳归回的人 (亚6:10)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.29;
son of: Baanah (H1196H); also called Heldai at 1Ch.27.15; Heled at 1Ch.11.30;
Another name of che.lev (חֵ֫לֶב "Heleb" H2460)
§ Heldai = "worldly"
1) one of David's mighty warriors and the 12th captain of the monthly courses for the temple service
2) a returning exile in the time of Zechariah
